texts.biography: Ornithologist many years away from contact with civilization, Langley was fascinated to encounter the deadly beauty of the cockatrices. He learned his habits, his characteristics and especially how not to be a victim of penetrating gaze.
texts.name: Langley

{Cockatrice}
Increases Speed of any Cockatrice by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 3 level.
